metadata.name: Last Light
metadata.description:
When gunpowder was invented, The importance of the sword began to diminish, Magic became just a fairy tale told to children before bedtime. 

The throne supported by the knights was toppled by bullets.
The little princess and her guardians set out to find the lost magician to ask them to come back and save the kingdom.


Background : 
Pictures of the characters that was drawn for the cover of the novel.
But the author lost the manuscript when he moved house.
Therefore, it became a novel cover that has never been used until today.
